root.name: Genghis Khan II: Clan of the Grey Wolf
root.description: OverviewThe game is a sequel to the 1987 strategy game Genghis Khan.ScenariosScenario 1: The Conquest of Mongolia [Mongolia, 1184 AD]Scenario 2: Genghis Khan's Grand Ambition [Greater Eurasia, 1206 AD]Scenario 3: The Yuan Dynasty of China [Greater Eurasia, 1271 AD]Scenario 4: World Conquest [Greater Eurasia]
